title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 102.1 - Eligible areas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 102.1 - Eligible areas

State Regulations

The board shall, from time to time, determine and designate
areas eligible for location of business concerns applying for tax credits and
exemptions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
102.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
